statusLine.command: input=$(cat); [ ! -f /tmp/.claude-sl-init ] && { touch /tmp/.claude-sl-init; sleep 0.5; }; m=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name // "Claude"'); e="${CLAUDE_CODE_EFFORT_LEVEL:-}"; cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir // "~"'); d=$(basename "$cwd"); ctx=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); gb=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); gs=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git --no-optional-locks status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); st=$(echo "$gs" | grep -c '^[MADRC]' 2>/dev/null); mo=$(echo "$gs" | grep -c '^.[MADRC]' 2>/dev/null); ut=$(echo "$gs" | grep -c '^??' 2>/dev/null); printf '\033[36m‚ú¶ %s\033[0m' "$m"; [ -n "$e" ] && printf ' \033[90m(%s)\033[0m' "$e"; printf ' \033[90m‚îÇ\033[0m \033[33müìÇ %s\033[0m' "$d"; if [ -n "$gb" ]; then printf ' \033[90m‚îÇ\033[0m \033[32mÓÇ†  %s\033[0m' "$gb"; [ "$st" -gt 0 ] 2>/dev/null && printf ' \033[32m+%s\033[0m' "$st"; [ "$mo" -gt 0 ] 2>/dev/null && printf ' \033[31m!%s\033[0m' "$mo"; [ "$ut" -gt 0 ] 2>/dev/null && printf ' \033[90m?%s\033[0m' "$ut"; fi; [ -n "$ctx" ] && printf ' \033[90m‚îÇ\033[0m \033[35m‚è± %s%%\033[0m' "$ctx"; cost=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '(.cost.total_cost_usd // empty) | if . != "" then (. * 100 | round / 100 | tostring) else "" end'); [ -n "$cost" ] && printf ' \033[90m‚îÇ\033[0m \033[33müí≤%s\033[0m' "$cost"; echo
